string.text: My head hurts. Where am I? Who are you?!

Take it easy, You're lucky to be alive, there was an accident. I found you in the wreckage over there.. You must have been on that truck, a Death Truck!\nPut this raincoat on before the radiaton kills you! I got it off a dead bandit in the truck. Do you remember anything at all?
Death Truck?! wha....th...n...no, I can't remember anything! What the hell is a Death Truck and why was I on it!?

I can't say for sure but, it can't have been a good thing, I assure you! Death Trucks were used to export the victims of the NPP explosion, They're horrible things!\nWhy were you on it? That's your problem, not mine.\nTake these as well, you're going to need them. Use the Med-Kit until you can make it to the Village. Once you reach it, you best go see the Doctor!
Doctor? What Doctor?! Who the hell are you anyway!?

You'll find the Doctor in the Rookie Village, just further past the broken bridge. The Doctor stays in the undergrond Radio Room most of the time. He will help you, just tell him that Stargazer the Astrologer has sent you. He'll understand. Tell him that I will be waiting for him just past the bridge, he knows the place. Do this simple task for me, and I will repay you the next time we meet. Now:\nLISTEN UP! You won't be able to get past the Army Checkpoint under the bridge without offering them something in return. I can't give you any money, but I have stashed a bottle of Vodka, and another Med-Kit in a wooden box over at the old farmstead just before the bridge. You should go there to first to pick up the Vodka. Have a good look around while you're at it, there are always things laying around, just use caution, things come outa nowhere around here! Now, get moving!
I'll try and make it to the Village. Thank you for all your help!!
I saw the Doctor and gave him your message. You mentioned something about repayment for the favour?

Yes indeed, here you go, wear this on your belt. It will serve you well. I'd also like to offer you a bit of advice Marked One, stay away from the ATP!! It's been completely overrun by Bandits, and unless you know the way out of there, you will be stuck there, indefinitely!
Thanks, Stargazer.
Hello there Marked One, what do you need?

Stargazer sent me to see you. He says that you can help me. My body aches all over, and my head feels as if someone has been using it as a punch bag! He's also asked me to tell you that he will be waiting for you just past the fallen bridge, in the usual place. He said that you would know the place. Can you help me, please?

So you don't know who you are, you say? Well, I know who you are, but it would be best for me not to say for now. It will come back to you eventually, you'll see. Here, drink this medicine and go to sleep. When you wake up, go and see Sidorovich, the local Trader. He will start you on the path you seek.\nDon't bother trying to go see him before drinking this. He simply won't talk to you. You a stink of a Death truck! You need to take this medicine first, and then go talk to Sidorovich when you wake up. I must go and meet up with Stargazer. Pleasant dreams Marked One. We will meet again. I'm sure of that!.
Ok, I will take your medicine. Perhaps it will help.
Nice to see you again, that medicine you gave me had quite a kick to it!!
You're starting to look better already. Have you remembered anything about yourself?

No, I haven't, nothing at all. When I slept after taking your medicine, I dreamt that I was in a horrible place, a cave somewhere, full of terrifying creatures and mutants!! In the end I met a man, a Doctor, like yourself. He was very strange. And he had two companions with him. They didn't talk much, not much at all. He gave me something similar to take that you had given me, though it brought me back to reality. I still don't remember anything.
Be patient, It will all come back to you. You need to follow the path which is laid out for you. I am heading North with Stargazer. I'm sure our paths will cross again some day.
I need to find out the truth, but in order to do that, I'm going to need some better Weapons and Armour.

Most impressive S.T.A.L.K.E.R.!!! You managed to take all of them out single-handedly, even though they were well armed and equipped! Do not assume that they were my men though, because they weren't!!! I suppose you are here for the Flash-Drive?, and who was it that snitched on me this time?
Who's men were they then, if not yours? And yes, I am here for the Flash-Drive and I don't intend to leave until I have it!

These guys were Mercs! My affiliation is, shall we say, complicated. You don't need to know about that just yet. Have you any idea what is on this Flash-Drive?! No? I was going to sell it for profit, because all it contains is useless garbage. In fact, this whole meeting was a sham!\nDon't bother asking questions, I can't answer them for you yet. So here's the deal... I'll give you the USB-Stick for 50,000ru and we'll call it a day. Otherwise, you will have to kill me for it, but, it is not adviseable to do so, because in the future, perhaps, fate will bring us together again, and we both may gain from it.
You speak in riddles, but, as I need the Flash-Drive, I'm willing to pay for it, here's your money.
You made the right choice, and now, I must go, we will meet again.
Can't wait! Be seeing you!
I think you mistook me for someone else, prepare to meet your maker, mother...!!!
Who's men were they then, if not yours? And yes, I am here for the Flash-Drive and I don't intend to leave until I have it.

These guys were Mercs! My affiliation is, shall we say, complicated. You don't need to know about that just yet. Have you any idea what is on this Flash-Drive?! No? I was going to sell it for profit, because all it contains is useless garbage. In fact, this whole meeting was a sham!\nDon't bother asking questions, I can't answer them for you yet. So here's the deal... I'll give you the USB-Stick for 50,000ru and we'll call it a day. Otherwise, you will have to kill me for it, but, it is not adviseable to do so, because in the future, perhaps, fate will bring us together again, and we both may gain from it.
You speak in riddles, but, as I need the Flash-Drive, I'm willing to pay for it, here's your money.
You made the right choice, and now, I must go, we will meet again.
Can't wait! Be seeing you.
I think you mistook me for someone else, prepare to meet your maker, mother...!!!
Hello, I'm told that you can offer more than just repairs. Rumor has it that you have some useful information to trade as well?
What exactly are you looking for?
Anything useful you can offer would be most appreciated.

You cannot possibly think that I would simply give out information to anybody that asks for it, do you!? You are going to have to do something for me first, then I will tell you something useful, and perhaps reward you as well.
I'm listening, go on.

Have you spoken with Lukash yet? If not, then you will, and he will send you on a mission to search for two important objects. Well, I have one of those objects here already, and will offer it as a reward to you if you get me something. I know for a fact that in the ATP there is a working vice. Well, I need it for the work that I do, and I want you to bring it to me, do we have a deal?
Sure, I'll do your dirty work. I'll be back with your vice in a little while.
If you think that I'm going to lug a vice around in my backpack, then you must have a few screws loose!!
Hello again Screw. I've got some good news...
I thought perhaps the Zone had taken you!
This thing weighs a ton!!! I'm glad to be rid of it!!! HERE!
Here is a Controller's Brain you need for Lukash's quest. If you haven't found another one as of yet, you will have to travel to Chernobyl-2, maybe south, and there you will find another one.
Hey, I heard that you have been to Pripyat.
Greetings S.T.A.L.K.E.R., yes, I've just returned from there. Why do you ask?
Did you run into any Monolith forces there?
Fanatics, they are! However, they are led by skilled people. One of them told me how they plan to spread from the center of the Zone all the way to Cordon.
And how do they plan to do that?

Not sure exactly, but I have made contact with one of them, and I got some information about a trail that they often use to infiltrate the South from the Center of the Zone. I will share this information with you if you can get me some protection against Zombification. I need to return to Pripyat. If you get me some of the antidote, I will give you details about the transition from Chernobyl-2 to the ATP. The antidote is also called Antizombin. What do you say?
Zombifi.., what? Forget it! Yes, I need that information. I'll get you your antidote.
I'm afraid that I do not have the antidote, nor will I get it for you! Not even if you offered me a transition to the Moon!!
Here's your Antizombin. It's rare and precious stuff, but I'm sure this transition will be worth it!
Everything in the Zone is expensive! Do You think this is a hobby?!!
I wanted to ask you... How did you manage to make contact with the Monolith?

Through the sights of my Vintorez, HaHa!! I'm joking... Here, take the transition coordinates. But remember, due to the anomalous activity at Chernobyl-2, the transition marker tends to disappear from time to time. I've uploaded a photograph of it to your PDA. This should help!!
Hello, I hope we can cooperate. I don't want to join the Freedom faction just now, but maybe We can help each other?
Don't expect something for nothing. I will only offer missions that are advantagous to Freedom or myself.
Well, what do you offer this time?
I have a job for you, no small matter. Moscow has given me a request, do you know the city?
Certainly. I know Moscow... Where is it???

Alright, you passed the apptitude test! You will be suprised to hear that Controller Brains have become a delicacy for the Moscow elite. Not just any brains, only the ones found in Chernobyl and 2 possess the taste and unique restorative quality. These brains are already available. You should be able to find them on the ground. However, there are rumours that the Monolith have reconnoitered the ATP territory. They might have brought some of these brains with them. Talk to Screw, behind my HQ. He's recently been looking for a stalker to explore the ATP. He might have some valuable info for you. I will send the details to your PDA. Oh Yes, and besides the brains, you'll need to bring me 300,000ru. I know its a lot to ask but your reward will be worth it.
Mmmm, yes, I will try to find you a couple of Brains, but thats a lot of money you ask for!
It will be worth it! A big reward awaits you!
Hello chief! I didn't find anything in the ATP. I had to search for them in Chernobyl-2. Here's your brains, ehhh!
You were in Chernobyl???? Only two? I hope there are more! I need three!
You only ordered two, try counting on the other hand! Im happy to hand over these two, but 300,000!, that Hurts!.

Thanks! I hope you didn't damage the goods. Let's see if you've eaten any, no, I don't see any bite marks. Now for your reward!!!! Here's a rare artefact! AND, more importantly, a directory of teleports that belonged to the Monolitian leaders near the Monolith base in the Sarcophagus!\nAlso, you will find a Camouflage Exoskeleton. I heard these items belonged to Strelok, one of the few to ever reach the Sarchopagus. But that might only be a rumour.
Whats new in the Zone?

Not much, unless you haven't heard about the new path yet. Look in your PDA, there's a mark. THe Bandits have found a transition to a new territory!!! It's in the Bar territory. If you can get past all the dogs, you then have to jump a fence.
That's something new!
The problem is, nobody knows of an exit! You will get stuck in there forever! Best to walk around the Zone and find out where the return path is first! After all someone must know.
I'll try to find a veteran stalker who might know the way back.
Be careful, after the last emission a strange anomaly has appeared behind the bridge!
Thanks for the warning.
Listen, you can probably help me. I've heard there is a path to a new territory, the ATP I believe they're calling it. But I do not know where it is, do you?
Yes, I know of such a path. Only it's useless to you, you can't get back out. There are three exits: to Cordon, Army Warehouses, and Pripyat. I know of only one, to Cordon.
That's great! will you show me?
I will tell you, but you've got to agree to do something for me first.
What is it you want?

A disk. A normal computer disk. The disk to is useless to you, as it's information is encrypted. The last message from my courier was one week ago. He hid from mutants in one of the sheds in the ATP. If you accept this task you will be rewarded. I must warn you though, bandits are looking for this disk. They think the disk holds data outlining a transition from the ATP to the Zone's center, so be careful!!! The entrance and an exit from this location are on your PDA. The ATP is dangerous territory, stalker!!!
Mmm, yes, this better be worth it!
Well you know the road better than I do. Go yourself.
Hello Adrenalin! I found your disk.
Hello. I'm glad you have returned alive... And the courier?
I Saw a body. It appeared untouched. However, I had no time to investigate as bandits appeared out of nowhere. They were seriously armed and wanted to play!!!

Well, we can put these affairs to an end! As a reward, you can take a pair of my personal nodes and some information. While you were gone I was able to find another exit from ATP to the Army Warehouses. I've sent the info to your PDA. Oh, and Sakharov knows about the third path to Pripyat...
Professor, do the military visit here often?

Are you on friendly terms with the military? Ah yes, they have no love for stalkers. Although, if you do a job for them, then you might convince them of your loyalty. They arrive sometimes when the zombies threaten the bunker. I often call for thier help too, especially recently. By the way, about the military men, I've got an offer for you.
And what might you need Professor?
About a year ago, The Doctor visited me. He's a very kind and wise person. He gave me a keepsake, a medical bag. But for me it was a very sentimental gift!
Oh, Why?

I was recently stopped at a military check point. They demanded vodka but I didnt have any. My bag was taken by a military captain. He refused to give it back, and to spoil relations with the military here is impossible for my research. That particular captain is often on duty in the Chernobyl area. Try to get my bag and I will reward you with a transition from the ATP directly to Pripyat. I can assure you, this transition will be very useful. Will you do it? I will give you have a good artefact, and the approximate location of the captain in Chernobyl. I will send the info to your PDA.
Thats a big risk for a common medical bag. I have never been to that area... But the artefact will be useful, and the info about the transition would be very important.
You want me to face untold danger for an old bag in Chernobyl!? Look for another sap!!!
Hello Professor! I made it back alive!
Great to see you Marked One! Have you really brought my bag? How did you manage to persuade the captain?

Yes, I've brought your bag. And the captain was persuaded by the sight of my rifle! He quickly agreed. I even got his money! Ah, just a joke Professor, he recieved early retirement, job security, HA!, what can ya say?
Well I've never found death so humorous! Thanks for the bag! It is very important to me. Here's the transition information for the ATP to Pripyat.
Doc, have you heard about the abandoned mine and the Miner? He asked about you, I have left the Monolith Splinter artefact with him.
The Miner? So he lives!? good news! I thought for a long time he was dead. You were supposed to bring me an artefact...
The miner will give it to me only if I bring him something.
Ahhh, the Medallion, but I don't have it right now...
So where is it?

Right after the accident in Chernobyl, I dropped a backpack on a roof of one of the skyscrapers in Pripyat. The Medallion is in the backpack. I tried many times to get it, but there were too many snipers! Once the military nearly killed me, other times I nearly fell!! Bring the backpack and I will be mostgrateful. You will find the reward for this difficult work on the roof. Oh, and you can only access the roof by going through the ATP
OK Doc, I will try. Always glad to help, for a price!!!
Doc, since childhood I've been afraid of heights, anything above 3 floors, FORGET IT!!! Forgive me, but let somebody else engage in your acrobatics!
Hi Doc! Here, I have your medallion.
I knew you would succeed, Stelok. After all, you are the best!
Here take it. To get to the skyscrapers, I had to pass through a teleport.

Thanks, your task was long and dangerous, but interesting. After all, you are a stalker. As for the Medallion, take it to the Miner. You can give him my regards. The Monolith Splinter artefact, you can keep it for yourself. But remember its very radioactive!
Prof, I have a question.
Yes, I'm listening.
I need a recipe for the transformation of a controllers stomach to a rare artefact.

Yes, I know of such a recipe. Only, it's a question not of the stomach contents, but a Bezoar. A Bezoar is a big old lump of food, which has got stuck in controllers stomach and cannot leave. A very rare find!
Ughhh, a bowel blockage? Crap!? Ok Professor, can you give me the recipe?

Certainly, but not so fast. You don't need to go anywhere, but I need a 50,000ru donation for the development of local science. And with the present crisis, the world has completely forgotten about us!
A Donation? If thats what you want call it? Sure...
Professor, this is hogwash! There'll be no donation from me...
With all the vodka you drink, how do you get any work done?
Work isn't a problem. My problem is I want to make an omelette, but there's something missing...
Like what? Fresh Anchovies, Mimosa bubbly, what? I'm just DYING to know. I'm verklempt already!
I have Sausage, Bread and canned food, but no Eggs! Chickens can't live in the zone, just Ravens, circling Ravens...
Just how much have you had to drink today? Three or four bottles?, dude!!!

I'm serious!!! I need ten eggs, raven eggs, will you get them for me? I can get you a very special weapon in exchange. You should ask Akim, the new dealer from Cordon. He can tell you where to find them.
Well, a special weapon sounds fun! I'll find out what Akim knows.
Cook, do you think a stalker-veteran is going to search the Zone for ten eggs? No way! You ARE plastered!!!
Greetings, any vodka left?
Your back! I hope you found something.
Sorry I got hungry and fried them up, taste like S###!!! Just jokin, here's your precious eggs.
What?! Oh no! You've broken one!!! Here, take the weapon anyway, OAF!
Hi Akim, Do you know where I can find some raven eggs?
Whose eggs? Raven? OH, a Burer? I will tell you a secret, they are not present!
Not present? What do you mean? Is this a riddle??? Just tell me where to find them!

I Know a place, but for the info you are going to have to do some work. I have ordered some medicine for an important customer. He's one of the leaders of a local Bandit group. My courier lost his nerve and dropped the viles in the dark while sneaking into Cordon.
And where should I search for this medicine?

The vials of this medicine are in a minefield near the military post, in south Cordon. To the left of the road when facing the checkpoint. I only need three of them. You can find more but I just need three.
Thanks, a minefield next to a military checkpoint... and I thought you were going to give me something difficult!\n Care to give me a mine detector before I go?
Stroll into a minefield? Not for lousy raven eggs! Are you NUTS!!!?!
Hi Akim. I've brought your medicine. It stinks really bad! Did the patient will die from the smell??
My client only needs teaspoon. Stinks you say? So it's likely you have more bottles in your backpack then?
So where are these devil eggs?
In the Forgotten Forest. Search the tree stumps, or near them. You should find them easy enough.
Hello, who are you?

I'm the Miner, I've been here long before the Chernobal incident. Quite a few of us were here, but now there's only three of us. The others were killed mutants, disease or when a large part of the mine collapsed.
Why do you still live down here, and what was it earlier?

I've gotten used to living underground. It wasn't safe to go to the surface after the incident, so we stayed here. I haven't seen sunlight for years. I'm afraid of going blind if I go to the surface. Nobody from the surface has come here for a long time. This place was a coal mine, but that was a long time ago! Now monsters and anomalies have surrounded us, and recently the Monolith have settled in also! What about you? Why are you here?
I dont know how I got here. I know only I should give you the Monolith Splinter piece. I'm sure I will return for it. I can't carry it any further for now.
Leave it with me. When the time feels right, I'm sure you'll come back. It will be here. Here, take this medicine for your weariness. It will return you on your journey... Good luck!
Thanks. We will only meet again if I survive! I Know that I need to give you this Monolith Splinter Piece, but who am I? When will all this become clear? When I find out... I'll be sure to return.
Hello Miner, I Have returned! I need that Monolith Splinter I left with you.
Greetings! Im glad that you're still alive! A long time has passed since we last met.
The Doctor told me to bring you this Medallion. It's what you requested, right? Do you still have my artefact?
Oh Yes, it really is the Medallion! Thank you so much! Your artefact is still here. There is nobody here to steal it, and monsters wouldn't eat it!!! Oh, I wanted to ask you something...
About what?

I want to get used to the light again. The book that you brought to me.. I cannot read it. Could you bring me two small lamps? I don't know to find them, except from the dealers near to the Zone's border.
I will go and see one of the dealers in Cordon. I'll ask them about these small lamps.
I'm not going anywhere, Its too dangerous!, use a match!!!
Hi Miner, I got your lamps.
That's great news.
Here you are. The batteries are still new!
Thanks, I hope I'm able to read the book of the father now. Take your artefact, but dont forget, It's EXTREMELY radiocative. Say hi to The Doctor, my brother. I Hope this isnt our last meeting.
Akim, where can I find a couple of small lamps?
Greetings, what do you need the lamps for?
Its a long story... Can you get me some lamps with fresh batteries?
I was once scared of the dark you know... As a child I kept a small lamp in my room. Oh those were the days of being naive, ha-ha.
Are you listening to me? Cut the bullshit, can you get them or not?

Certainly, but I need you to do something for me first. I get quite bored here between customers, so I want you to get me a Rubik's Cube. In the Dark Valley bandit base, Some moron threw it on the roof of one of the buildings. If you bring it to me, I'll get the lamps.
OK! OK! I will go get it, what's next, a Barbie Doll!
Go get your own Cube, Psycho!
I've got the cube, You got the lamps.
Thanks for the cube, but the small lamps are not here.
What!! Give me what you promised or I will feed you to a Sea Urchin!
Calm down, calm down. I know where they should be. They're near Crest's camp in the Forgotten Forest, next to a helicopter. Look on the ground.
Hello. I've just found the netrance to this cave... I've come for my artefact and some counciling.
Greetings. If you've come for the Monolith Splinter, you should first bring to me one item from its present owner, then I can give it to you. And what counciling do you seek?
I'm not sure who the owner is, nor how to find them. For counciling, I've been asked to find some treasure that someone has lost somewhere in this cave.

You should talk to the Doctor. I've known him for a long time. The treasure... I guess you mean the ancient coins. Many people have come looking for them already, only to find death! You must descend to the lower part of the cave to look for the coins. There is also another place in the lower tunnels where you can into a secret part of the cave we call the Labyrinth. The labyrinth is a horrible place! Be Carfull!!!
And how do I get out of the cave?

From here there are two ways. The first leads to Agroprom, this is the closest exit on your minimap. The second exit leads to the Dump. It's in the bottom levels of the cave. I think you'll find it without any problems. I havea request... In the Forgotten Forest there's a book, would you please find it for me? Near the coins you will find a valuable artefact. If you bring the book for me, I will give to you a second valuble artefact! There's only two! They are born only every 10 years!
I will try to find the treasure, and I will also look for your book.
I haven't found the book yet. This cave is almost as bad as taking the subways used to be!
Here, I have brought the book.
Thanks. It was my father's book.
Strange, so much time has passed and its like new! That must make you happy.
Its not a simple book. Here, take your reward. Im very happy with how this has turned out.
Greetings. You look like a man who can be trusted, do you have any information I could use?
Hey, You, badly need a shave! You look tough enough so here's whats up... I've got some dirty work to offer and its not a job for ah... Men in Diapers! You know what I mean?
You're not checkin my pants!!!, but if its dangerous it better pay well!!! I'm brave, not stupid.

I think you're the man for the job. Theres an abandoned cave. It was there long before the explosion in Chernobyl. Some treasure was lost somwhere inside the cave. Nobody's ever been able to find it or retrieve it in anyway.
What kind of compensation am I looking at, and where can I find the entrance?

I know of two entrances, both are in the train tunnel, one in Garbage, and another in Agroprom. Compensation will be... VERY large monetary payment. In the cave there is a miner, or miners. Talk to them, they will be able to help you find an exit.
I will try to find this treasure. I just hope it's real!
Who needs money in the Zone? I have just reached the Bar. I'm getting drunk, now piss off!
I was in the cave and I found the treasure!
Shhhh, Are you serious?!
Take your coins. HEY EVERYBODY, the drinks are on HIM!
Heres your cash Marked One, good or bad, your making a name for yourself around here very quickly!
Hello Miner, I had completely forgotten that I left my PDA. I only remembered in the Monolith Base. I read a note I found there.
Yes, your PDA is in this cave.
It has a lot of useful data that I need.
I can't read or use such devices, I never had time for gadgets. But, before I can give it to you I must ask you something.
About what?

There is a controller who quite often appears here. Killing it is useless, it's a clever creature! Whenever I send men to eliminate it, it disappears! I need an artefact for protection, but you won't find it in the cave. It Is called the Scalp of the Controller. I'm sure such a skilled stalker as you can get one. How about it?
Controllers can be a real pain in the ass, but, I will get you the artefact.
Its a rare artefact and I can't do without it, I can't help you.
Here's the scalp of the controller, enjoy.
Thanks! Now I will have immunity against the annoying controller!
Can I have my PDA now?

Ah yes, it was stolen... But the thief never left the cave. The mutants killed him. Find his corpse and you'll find your PDA. I can help a little... You already know where the transition to the Labyrinth is. Look for it in there.
Hello commander! you dont look very happy! What's up?
I dont need questions. I need answers!
Whats wrong? A high rank, plenty of vodka, what else could you wish for?

There is a reason, not life threatening, but it gets to me sometimes. Maybe you can help. A long time ago when I was a green lieutenant, I was on campaign during the Chechen Republic war. I was presented with a flask by the First Division's Commander. I kept it with me always, but now it's missing!! You help me, and I'll help you, Eh?
So where in the big wide Zone will I find a flask, let alone yours?
Ask Lanky in the Bar. Rumours have it that someone tried to sell him such a flask.
I must be nuts, but I'll look into this. It couldn't have gone far.
I don't have time for this. I have the Monolith to worry about.
Ufff, Lanky is a low-life and a jerk! It's difficult to do business with him!
Has he told you anything?
That parasite Lanky made this very expensive for me. I hope you consider that when it comes to compensation. Here, is this your flask?
Ah! Yes! I need to fill it up. Your reward can be picked up from Sidorovich, Just him I sent you. I have some cash for you for now, more than my fighters receive in TWO months!
Hello, I would like to ask you something...
Well, out with it then. I've got a lot of work to do today, so be quick.
Did someone try to sell you a stolen flask? I need it.
To me it doesn't matter that it's stolen or not. My price for the service: 100 bottles of vodka, the Scalp of the Controller artefact and, uhm, also ten microcircuits ought to do it.

Slow down there! Who are you?!, one of the TRUMPS or sumpthin?! I'm not doing all that for a stupid flask??? Now listen, I'm not asking to get anything for free! but your gonna have to lower that price or I walk out of here.

OK, OK, chill a little! We'll drop the price to 50,000ru, and instead of the Scalp of the controller, make it, uhm, five Quirks, and ten microcircuits. The microcircuits can be found in Cordon. The military recently repaired thier transmitters and the old microcircuits have simply been thrown out. I was pumpin a soldier full a vodka and got him to spew something about throwing them into the toilet. well, I think he said toilet... He sorta went bar diving after that.
OK thats better, still a ripoff but I need to stay tight with Petrenko.
Your greed is unmatched in the zone, no way, chow!
Here's all your loot, those micro-circuits smell like the place I found them in or, come to think of it, this place as well! I'm gonna have to sanitize my backpack after this.
This is excellent! But the flask, it isnt here!!!
You had better be joking! After all I went through!

Dont get so angry. The man who tried to sell me the flask was drunk. When I wouldn't pay him what he wanted he left. Then he came back and told me he threw it through the gate. It's the gate on the right as you pass those Duty morons coming in from the dump. There's a couple of places you can get over the fence there. Ought to be a pretty sight in that suit! The flask should still be behind that gate.
Greetings!
Hi, I have a task for you. If you'll help I would be grateful.
And what do you need?
I had some info smuggled out of the Freedom base. It is contained in thermoses, believe it or not.
Thermoses?! Where did you get thermoses?, Ahhh, forget it, and where will I find these thermoses?

There are several, and they are different in size. Five are big and located behind the Freedom base somewhere, under a tree I think. Follow the powerlines and you can get behind the base. watch out tho, towers at each of the corners have snipers. You're best going at night. I sent a sketch of the place to your PDA. To find the five smaller thermoses you'll need to talk with Garik in the Bar. He says he likes beer, go figure.
Well chief, another fun puzzle. All right, I'll find them for you.
Sorry I can't help, I'm engaged in other matters at the moment, liquid matters that is!
Here, take this crap.
Thermoses, all ten?
All made of stainless steel, not a western made one in the group!

This is excellent! I Will give you the location of a cache. My men caught this military soldier with a backpack somewhere in the Dark Valley. Bandits have somewhat of a base there as you probably know by now. Anyway, checkout the observation towers, I hear there's quite a bit of loot in em.
Garik, I need to ask you something.
What is it you want?
The thermoses, I want to know where you took them.
It is classified information, bug off.... No wait, how bout say 10,000ru.
Hmph, you got me by the Kahonas this time, OK, choke on it! Now tell me where they are!
Eh?! Alright droppings of a psuedodog! Wait! There's more I think. I smoke, so I want 10 packs of cigs as well. lots of stalkers trade in them.
Damn! Money is no problem but the cigarettes, they might take awhile, ah, srew it, I'll be back.
Garik, your nothing but a petty crook with a bad habit. Stick that info up your a%%!
Here's your money and cigs, use the first for kickin the second, loser.
Man, you are desperit! Thought I'd never see you again!
Piss off and just give me the info already.
OK, OK, don't be such a snorkass about it. The thermoses are in a building in Pripyat. Next to the bus station, There's a destroyed shop, look on the top floor.
Hey there Sid, how's it hangin?!
Long time no see, Marked One, been keepin busy eh, seems I've heard some chatter lately, take care.
No time for chit-chat Sid, I'm here on business. Petrenko sent me to see you.
Well then, don't get too comfortable. I'll save this beer for another time then, Eh?! So, How can I help you?
I need to pick up a package that Petrenko left here.

Well, Hmmm, Maybe you need to do a job for me first! If you want that package that is. SO, Mr. tough guy!! The Military from Agroprom has ordered two tool boxes from me. Apparently someone messed up a load of their Armoured vehicles, some Rambo kinda dude, did this nut fall of a death truck or what? OH, Shh, sorry Marked One! Anyway, this Rambo stalker ought to be careful, they are probably looking for him very intently, no dought there's a bounty. Anyways, each toolbox contains a hammer, wrench and screwdriver. Hammers and screwdrivers have been seen around the ATP, and the wrenches are probably at the Army Warehouses, most likely still in Screw's workshop. Since you are probably to blame for this mess, you are the one that is going to fix it, understood?!
Someday you are going to push me just a little too far Sid, might do a Rambo on YOUR butt someday, might be fun, who knows, Eh Sid?!

Heh, wow, don't take it out on me, man... I'm not here for vacation either! Just do this job, and I will give you Petrenko's package and you can go about your bussiness of killing people OK MacBein?, Crap, your a cold one!

Man!! When you said hammers, you could have told me that you meant frikn SLEDGE hammers!! This crap is heavy!! You should try and carry these things around for a while, maybe lose 100kg or so, lard butt!
If I had told you that, then you probably wouldn't have agreed to take the job, here, set them up here on my desk. And, Stop with the crap already!!
I ought to smash your desk with the hammers!, Well, Anyways, take them. Now, Petrenko's package, where is it? I need to get out of this hole to where I can breath and get back to work!

Well, as you can imagine, Petrenko doesn't seem to trust me with the case itself. All he gave me are these coordinates leading to it's location. It is located somewhere in the Forgotten Forest. Just after the transition, you need to keep moving along the edge of the border, then you will find some stones, one of which is flat, that's where it is. Good Luck! You'll need it!, tough guy!
General, I need your help.
I Could help, but whats in it for me? I think there's a task I need done. Hmmmm, yes, I've got one!
Crap! OK, I'm listening, shoot.

Marked One, you've done pretty well for yourself so far... So listen: My data tells me that bandits have established new communications with the mercenaries and have been informing them of our movements. Things are serious. My men are constantly getting ambushed. They don't grow on trees you know, although everything else seems possible in the Zone, eh stalker?
Well?, I don't read minds, ESPECIALLY yours!, so spill it already!

Mister CONGENIALITY we have here! Go find me a computer and a videolink. The computer is somewhere inside the Dark Valley Bandit Base. My agents report there's a secret room somewhere that houses the equipment. Oh and have a look around for a book... It's very important.
General, if I get all these pieces of garbage, would you prepare for me an officer's uniform, not below colonel?
I have no love for bandits, but you're a better person to send than Ivantsov. He just sits around playing with himself, poor sap! OK, deal.
A real Soldier! I knew you would agree!
You've rewarded me well so far, so, how can I refuse?
Well, is my colonel uniform ready? Is it possible to try it on?
It's possible, Only where's the electrical goods?
Here's your toys General, play nice online. You never know who is out there in cyber-space eh?!
Look, screw the uniform! I've got something MUCH better! Hope this makes your day!
Hey Professor
Greetings Stalker. I have urgent business for you, no time to talk of the reward now, but it WILL be good.
Why? Whats happened?
Some of our scientists have been attacked by Mercs in the Wild Territory. I need you to escort them out.
I thought you were under the protection of the Military? call them on the radio, they can send a chopper, or are they all drunk again?

HA, HA, you crack me up Marked One! Close tho. They have the only phone with them but they cant get the military to respond. They are almost at the bunker, I need you to meet them near the transition from Yantar to the Wild Territory. Escort them to the bunker and you'll have to open the door for them. Wait there until they have entered safely. Whatever happens, get me that phone, thats the MOST important thing!, got it?
Im going, gees, calm down before you soil yourself already!
Well, I do need some sleep!, I can't help you much today, sorry.
Here, take the phone.
This is excellent! And what happened with my people?
Professor you know how the doors to the bunker slam open and shut, well,\nnot to difficult to guess, not too pretty. I'm glad I don't have to clean it up!!
Well, sad, well anyway, young man, accept a modest gift from science!
Greetings, Mr. all-knowing.
What? Oh, Yes, stalker. I have a business offer for you.
Blow something up? Someone to hunt?, Well?
No, sorry. Not so fun I'm afraid. I buy up stalker PDAs, live, dead, broken and whole.
So this is recycle central for all those lost PDAs? how green of you!

Well, I AM the informant you idiot. I scan them for any valuable info. I should know as much as possible, as the trade obliges. Listen, for every 20 PDAs you can play a small lottery. Rewards can be: cartridges, artefacts (except rare of course!), or maybe a weapon. For 40 PDAs, I will share info on a hiding places with you. The stashes could have belonged to a master or, maybe a rookie Stalker. The risk could be rewarding, or not.
Sounds like a big production to me! But, I will collect them, exchanging them makes more sense than trashing them, Eh.
Greetings
Well, have you brought some business my way?
Here, I've got 20 PDAs for you.
Man, my backpack is about to burst, take the 40 PDAs.
I'm too busy now, I ain't got time for no stinkin PDAs. Maybe some other time, I'm dry as a bone!
Well, you've brought 20 pieces, LET'S PLAY THE LOTTERY!
40 pieces?!! I'll be hacking all week! I can just imagine how many people YOU have sent to the other world! Alright, give me the PDAs. I will give you the info on the hiding places.
Well then, later dude.
A real live general! Why aren't you in Moscow living the good life?

Hmph, stalkers, smart mouths, all of em! Open your eyes! You're in a war-zone if you hadn't noticed. There are never enough soldiers and we need all the firepower we can get! So, are you ready to show what you've got? or you gonna tuck your tail in and run like a blind dog?!!!
Big words General! Whats going on?

I have just been informed that Mercenaries are going to attack Duty's northern post bordering the Wild territory. I've already sent more men, and your presence would help the defense. I don't want to send someone who is going to hide in a corner and shit himself while my fighters perish! Therefore your task is to destroy the leader of the group. He goes by the nickname Hump.
Hump?! Where are we? Notre Dame? Sounds like a snoozer to me!

Its all about the Hardware!!!! Not Idle talk! I expect you to destroy Hump. There'll be no further dialogue otherwise. Your reward is whatever you find on Hump and his Mercenary mob. You will approach me later. I will give you a signal when they are about to attack. But before you can do this, you need to aquire an OTS 14 Tunder. It's very similar to the Groza
Hey General, Say Hello to My Little Friend! One kick-ass OTS. I'm ready to rock-n-roll!
Good Man! Now I see you mean bussiness!
Guys just like to have fun. So whats up with the Merc mob?
Hold on while I contact the post. here, take these first-aid kits, they might be useful!
Well, any news?
Yes, our forward reports that the Mercenaries are already on the way!!!!!
Well General, you've been de-Humped! how's it feel?
This is excellent, bit of a mess, but excellent indeed! Duty is grateful to you.
No problem General. I told you I could fight. Now I've shown you, so?
Yes, I'm persuaded. I will adhere to our friendly verbal agreement. We need a good man like you.
Maybe so but you were supposed to get Hump. I heard it was one of my lower recruits that got him?!
Well General.. in such a rucus and in such tight quarters anything can happen.
Still a deals a deal, and you got the loot off the trash we just took out. But at least you tried and we won't forget that.
